description: This file defines React functional components for displaying transient notification messages, namely Toast and ToastContainer, which manage individual toasts and a stack of toasts respectively.

methods.name: Toast
methods.description: A React functional component that displays a single transient message with optional auto-hide functionality.

methods.name: ToastContainer
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a list of toasts inside a container, managing their display and removal.
